channel.title: Welcome Mattia from MattiaNode as a moderator on RadixTalk
channel.description:
I‚Äôm very happy to announce that @Mattia, who runs the [MattiaNode](https://explorer.radixdlt.com/#/validators/rv1qvjz86qwa7l80y8vhfuhz6957ch6texdmpk98rg2gtakhr0avan4jplkxy7) validator and [MattiaWiki](https://docs.mattia.wiki/radix/node/) website, has joined the RadixTalk forum as a moderator.
Mattia is an active contributor to [Radix DLT Discord](https://discord.gg/radixdlt) and has written some excellent HowTo guides on his website at https://docs.mattia.wiki/radix/node/. I'm looking forward to Mattia bringing his expertise as a Validator node runner and creator of user friendly guides to the RadixTalk forum.

item.title: Welcome Mattia from MattiaNode as a moderator on RadixTalk
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Thank you for the warm welcome Stuart!
You can also find an introduction to my validator here.

Read full topic
